bill_title: restrict the disclosure of personal information regarding motor vehicle records.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to restrict the disclosure of personal information regarding motor vehicle records. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-5 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Notwithstanding any other provisions of this chapter, the department may not sell personal information, as defined in § 32-5-143. The department may not disclose personal information, without the written consent of the person, except for the purposes permitted by §§ 32-5-144 to 32-5-147, inclusive. Section 2. That § 32-5-149 be amended to read: 32-5-149. Any No authorized recipient, except a recipient of an individual record under § 32-5-148, who resells or rediscloses may resell or redisclose personal information without the written consent of the person. An authorized recipient shall maintain for a period of at least five years records as to the information obtained and the permitted use for which it the information was obtained and shall make such the records available for inspection by the department, upon request.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
